document.body:
Brandon Joseph Rhode
Executed September 27, 2010 10:16 p.m. by Lethal Injection in Georgia
40th murderer executed in U.S. in 2010 1228th murderer executed in U.S. since 1976 2nd murderer executed in Georgia in 2010 48th murderer executed in Georgia since 1976
